title: How are art and technology both important but different? - Quora

response.answer_text: These two human pursuits have been growing up together for a very long time. Many advances in technology have found their way into art, including lasers, numerical machine control, and 3D direct creation from a computer, which can make shapes that are impossible with other means. This same technology is being applied to create custom prosthetic parts, and laser surgery is common now, but these same tools can be applied to other things, like sculpture.
When I am working on a problem, I never think about beauty but when I have finished, if the solution is not beautiful, I know it is wrong. R. Buckminster Fuller
